title: Shikabanechou Undead
description:
The urban exploration of two teenagers causes them to run into a mysterious "Box", which encloses those infected with a virus called "Corpse". In that city, there is a teacher named Katsuragi Zakuro who hides a nefarious secret...

This particular release only covers the chapters that were worked on by the scanlation group 'Your Deer Friends'. To access previous chapters, please check other manga sites.
author: Iwaaki Haru
